default_question.question_text: What type of activity makes you feel most alive and engaged?
default_question.options_answer: Solving computing problems,Creating visual designs,Analyzing data patterns,Ensuring software quality

options_descriptions.Solving computing problems: You feel energized when unraveling complex puzzles and bringing ideas to life through technology, finding deep satisfaction in the moment a solution finally clicks into place
options_descriptions.Creating visual designs: You feel inspired when shaping how people experience technology, taking pride in creating beautiful, intuitive designs that make others' lives easier and more enjoyable
options_descriptions.Analyzing data patterns: You feel fascinated by uncovering hidden stories within numbers, experiencing that 'aha!' moment when data reveals insights that can genuinely help people make better decisions
options_descriptions.Ensuring software quality: You feel fulfilled knowing you're the guardian of excellence, taking pride in protecting users from frustration and ensuring they can rely on technology that truly works

progressive_questions.question_text: When you imagine yourself in your element, completely focused on a task, what are you doing?
progressive_questions.options_answer: Designing algorithms,Creating visual layouts,Manipulating datasets,Testing software functionality

options_descriptions.Designing algorithms: You see yourself lost in thought, excitedly mapping out elegant solutions to challenging problems, feeling that rush when everything comes together in a beautifully logical way
options_descriptions.Creating visual layouts: You picture yourself experimenting with colors, shapes, and flows, feeling a sense of creative joy as you craft experiences that will delight and help real people
options_descriptions.Manipulating datasets: You envision yourself exploring data like a detective, experiencing genuine excitement as patterns emerge and transform into meaningful stories that matter
options_descriptions.Testing software functionality: You imagine yourself meticulously ensuring everything works perfectly, feeling deeply satisfied knowing your attention to detail protects users from frustration

progressive_questions.question_text: What type of challenge makes you feel most proud when you overcome it?
progressive_questions.options_answer: Algorithmic challenges,Visual design challenges,Statistical analysis challenges,Debugging challenges

options_descriptions.Algorithmic challenges: You feel a deep sense of accomplishment when you crack a complex logical puzzle, experiencing that incredible satisfaction when your solution is both elegant and effective
options_descriptions.Visual design challenges: You feel genuinely proud when you've transformed a confusing experience into something intuitive and beautiful, knowing you've made technology more human and accessible
options_descriptions.Statistical analysis challenges: You feel thrilled when you've wrestled meaningful insights from complicated data, experiencing pride in knowing your discoveries can genuinely improve people's lives or businesses
options_descriptions.Debugging challenges: You feel like a hero when you track down elusive problems and fix them, taking pride in your persistence and the reliability you bring to products people depend on

progressive_questions.question_text: What kind of environment makes you feel energized and inspired?
progressive_questions.options_answer: Technology-driven projects,Artistic and creative spaces,Data-focused research,Quality assurance processes

options_descriptions.Technology-driven projects: You thrive in dynamic environments where innovation happens, feeling energized by cutting-edge tools and the excitement of building the future
options_descriptions.Artistic and creative spaces: You feel most inspired in collaborative, creative atmospheres where imagination and empathy are valued, and where you can blend beauty with purpose
options_descriptions.Data-focused research: You feel at home in thoughtful, analytical environments where curiosity is encouraged and where careful investigation leads to meaningful discoveries
options_descriptions.Quality assurance processes: You feel secure and purposeful in structured, detail-oriented settings where precision matters and where your commitment to excellence makes a real difference

progressive_questions.question_text: What skill would you be most excited to master as you grow in your career?
progressive_questions.options_answer: Programming and algorithm design,Design software proficiency,Data modeling and machine learning,Testing and quality assurance techniques

options_descriptions.Programming and algorithm design: You feel drawn to the idea of becoming fluent in the language of computers, excited by the power to create anything you can imagine through code
options_descriptions.Design software proficiency: You're inspired by the prospect of mastering creative tools that let you transform ideas into beautiful, user-friendly experiences that truly help people
options_descriptions.Data modeling and machine learning: You're fascinated by the possibility of teaching computers to learn and predict, excited to unlock insights that could genuinely change how we understand the world
options_descriptions.Testing and quality assurance techniques: You feel motivated by becoming an expert in ensuring excellence, knowing that your skills will protect users and uphold the highest standards of quality

progressive_questions.question_text: What type of accomplishment would make you feel most fulfilled?
progressive_questions.options_answer: Building efficient software,Designing impactful visuals,Uncovering data insights,Ensuring flawless software performance

options_descriptions.Building efficient software: You'd feel deeply satisfied knowing you've created something that truly works, solving real problems and making people's lives easier through technology
options_descriptions.Designing impactful visuals: You'd feel fulfilled seeing people connect with and enjoy your designs, knowing you've made technology more accessible, beautiful, and human-centered
options_descriptions.Uncovering data insights: You'd feel proud knowing your discoveries have led to better decisions and positive change, transforming raw information into wisdom that actually helps people
options_descriptions.Ensuring flawless software performance: You'd feel accomplished knowing users can completely trust the software you've validated, feeling proud that your diligence prevents problems and protects their experience

progressive_questions.question_text: How do you envision yourself contributing to a team in a way that feels meaningful?
progressive_questions.options_answer: Collaborating on code development,Collaborating on design feedback,Collaborating on data analysis,Collaborating on testing strategies

options_descriptions.Collaborating on code development: You see yourself as part of a creative team of builders, feeling energized by sharing ideas and collaborating to bring innovative solutions to life
options_descriptions.Collaborating on design feedback: You imagine yourself in thoughtful discussions about user needs, feeling fulfilled as you and your team refine designs to truly serve people better
options_descriptions.Collaborating on data analysis: You envision yourself translating complex findings into clear stories, feeling purposeful as you help others understand and act on important insights
options_descriptions.Collaborating on testing strategies: You see yourself as a trusted partner ensuring quality, feeling valued for your careful attention and the peace of mind you bring to the team

progressive_questions.question_text: What deeper purpose or impact motivates you to do your best?
progressive_questions.options_answer: Innovating with technology,Expressing creativity through design,Driving decisions with data,Maintaining high-quality standards

options_descriptions.Innovating with technology: You feel called to push boundaries and create the future, finding deep meaning in being part of technological advancement that shapes how we live
options_descriptions.Expressing creativity through design: You feel driven to make the digital world more beautiful and human, finding purpose in using your creativity to genuinely improve people's daily experiences
options_descriptions.Driving decisions with data: You feel motivated by the power of truth and evidence, knowing your insights help organizations and people make wiser, more informed choices
options_descriptions.Maintaining high-quality standards: You feel a strong sense of responsibility to protect users and uphold excellence, finding meaning in being the person others can count on for reliability

progressive_questions.question_text: What ethical value feels most important to you as you think about your future career?
progressive_questions.options_answer: Ensuring software security,Respecting design ethics,Maintaining data privacy,Promoting software reliability

options_descriptions.Ensuring software security: You feel a strong responsibility to protect people in the digital world, finding purpose in building safe systems that keep users and their information secure
options_descriptions.Respecting design ethics: You care deeply about treating users with dignity and respect, feeling committed to creating inclusive, honest designs that empower rather than manipulate
options_descriptions.Maintaining data privacy: You believe in honoring people's trust and autonomy, feeling driven to ensure personal information is handled with the care and respect everyone deserves
options_descriptions.Promoting software reliability: You take pride in being dependable, feeling responsible for ensuring that the technology people rely on won't let them down when it matters most
